title: WCAS SOCIOL 476-0-22 Topics in Sociological Analysis

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This seminar is designed to expose students to the realm of sociological research (and research in other disciplines, notably history) that addresses how we think about and memorialize the past. How is history constructed? How are historical events shaped and made socially meaningful? Who are the shapers and who are the shaped?
